backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for programs, KPIs, users, and team members, and includes comparison utilities for sorting along with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs for build and verification tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose within the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theme styles for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, and conditional rendering of the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard metrics view computing program and KPI statistics and rendering charts and progress data.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable alert dialog component for confirming deletion actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with logo, theme toggle, user profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Form dialog for creating or editing a KPI, including validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays and filters KPI data with search, role-based editing, and dialogs for creating or deleting KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and role, then saves profile information.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Calendar cell displaying a date with visual indicators for programs and styling for today, month context, and click actions.
Shows a sheet with all programs active on a selected day and allows clicking a program for details.
Provides buttons to switch between month, week, and agenda calendar views.
Displays detailed program information in a drawer with status, priority, dates, and unit info.
Contains utilities to filter programs by fields and count programs active on a given day.
Maps program status and priority values to display labels and styling classes.
Generates a 14‑day agenda list showing programs per day with click-to-view support.
Renders a month grid calendar highlighting programs active on each date.
Renders a week grid view with daily program listings and date headers.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Calendar interface for viewing programs by month, week, or agenda with filters and program detail interactions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Form dialog for creating or editing a program, handling division-based PIC selection and data submission.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Displays and filters programs with search, sorting, status/priority/division filters, and supports creating, editing, and deleting programs.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Generates filtered program or KPI reports by team, division, and priority, and supports exporting data to CSV.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing a team member with validation and form submission via mutations.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Lists, filters, and manages team members with search, division filter, and CRUD actions depending on user permissions.
Admin-only interface for viewing user profiles and updating their roles with access control handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance that updates when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Defines a hook that returns whether a given CSS media query currently matches, updating reactively on window changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, programs, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for gradients, animations, and card effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tab navigation, showing different sections based on the active tab and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining dark mode, content paths, custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing redesign goals for the Program Calendar, including UI requirements, view modes, filters, and existing features.
